I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. "Les Valseuses" was originally a novel that French film-maker Blier adapted to the screen, and as expected he adored this story with one monologue in particular being so seamless that you can easily read the words without blinking an eye.
